main_definition: To possess, own or experience something.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have possession of something tangible or intangible.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: להחזיק במשהו מוחשי או לא מוחשי.
meanings_and_examples.example: She is having a lot of fun at the party.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To experience an emotion, feeling, or state.
meanings_and_examples.example: He had mixed feelings about moving to a new city.
meanings_and_examples.example_hebrew: היו לו רגשות מעורבים לגבי מעבר לעיר חדשה.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To possess certain qualities or characteristics.
meanings_and_examples.example: She has great leadership skills and is very organized.
meanings_and_examples.example_hebrew: יש לה כישורי מנהיגות גדולים והיא מאוד מאורגנת.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To be in possession of an item, property, or asset.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: להיות ברשותו של פריט, נכס או נכס.
meanings_and_examples.example: They were having a sale on all their furniture.
meanings_and_examples.example_hebrew: הם עשו מבצע על כל הרהיטים שלהם.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having the necessary resources to accomplish something.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: יש את המשאבים הדרושים כדי להשיג משהו.
meanings_and_examples.example: We don't have enough time to complete this project alone.
meanings_and_examples.example_hebrew: אין לנו מספיק זמן להשלים את הפרויקט הזה לבד.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have certain responsibilities or obligations.
meanings_and_examples.definition_hebrew: להיות בעל אחריות או חובות מסוימים.
meanings_and_examples.example: He was having trouble meeting his financial commitments.
